00017   public:
00018     oid_t next;

00023 const size_t dbInitHashTableSize = 16*1024-1;

00025 class dbFieldDescriptor;
00026

00029     nat4  used;
00030     oid_t page;

00032   public:

00040

00042     
00043     static void  drop(dbDatabase* db, oid_t hashId);
00044
